::Zardus/The Galactors::

Zardus frowns, looking at the scanner reports and watching Hell 
Beast's Predacons leaving their base to head toward the CF. He 
activates his comm.

"Supernova, new orders," he says into it, "Go to the following 
coordinates and attack. Its a base, but I'm sure you'll be able to 
handle it."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Supernova recieves the orders from Zardus, along with the coordinates 
of Hell Beast's new base. He sends an order to his team, and the 
Scrap/Flare jet swoops down, Supernova jumping up and combining with 
them. THe jet, now consisting of Scrap, Flare, and Supernova, turns 
around, heading for Hell Beast's base. The Vicir/Slasys jet turns 
also, following the rest of the Galactors.
